title.rendered: STEDI TOYOTA PRADO 150 SERIES (MY18+) PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

content.rendered:
Suitable for the Toyota Landcruiser 150 Series Prado Bi-LED (August 2017 Production Models onwards) This Product is protected by Provisional Patent  2020902757

DETAILS

The new Landcruiser Prado has magnificent factory fitted Bi-LED headlamps. Problem is that wiring auxiliary driving lights that are high-beam switched is a nightmare. Up until this point, the only option for professional installers and DIY enthusiasts has been to purchase the Genuine Toyota Harness which retails for $190.00.

Below we compare features of the STEDI designed harness compared to the Genuine Toyota offering.

FEATURE COMPARISON  
SWITCH “ACTIVE” ILLUMINATION
STEDI √
TOYOTA ×
DASH LIGHT ILLUMINATION ×
STEDI √
TOYOTA ×
COMPATIBLE CONNECTORS TO POPULAR DRIVING LIGHTS
STEDI √
TOYOTA ×
INTERIOR DASH COMPONENTS NEEDING TO BE REMOVED FOR INSTALL
STEDI 3
TOYOTA 12
MAXIMUM CURRENT SUPPORT 
STEDI 35A
TOYOTA 30A

The wire lengths on the STEDI patch harness have been optimised to facilitate a very stealth factory-like install. The patch harness offered for sale is compatible with all STEDI Smart Driving Light harnesses sold separately and included with our driving lights and light bars.

In the interest of safe driving, like the genuine Toyota harness. we have designed our patch harness not to function with the vehicle’s factory auto-high beam or auto-headlight system. Similar to the Toyota harness, for safety reason

This Product is protected by Provisional Patent  2020902757

STEDI Designed & Manufactured: This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with Toyota. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

SPECIFICATIONS


 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Piggy Back Adapter Suitable for Toyota Landcruiser 150 Series Prado MY18+
  • Printed fitting instruction Manual
  • Cable ties
  • Rubber Grommet for firewall

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI TOYOTA PRADO 150 SERIES (MY18+) PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
